job.1: I'm a Master's student in Computer Science

Home.desc: I've always had a passion for  the vast field of computer science, in particular software development, which allows me to express my creativity and be innovative.

About.title: About
About.par1: Master 1 student in "Mathematics and Computer Science Applied to Social Sciences" at the University of Paris 8. My interest in programming stems from my passion for video games. Their development and animation aroused my curiosity and led me to explore this universe.
About.par2: From my computer science cursus, I chose to specialize in software development, deploying my creativity through code.
About.par3: Aside from programming, I have a variety of interests, including drawing, reading, photography, and video games.
About.par4: Here are some of the technologies that I master:

list.title: BotsCompete
list.desc: Secure competitve e-learning platform about machine learning challenges.

list.title: Walmart Recruiting Store Sales Forecasting
list.desc: Predicting the weekly sales of the Walmart historical sales dataset.

list.title: Thiqa - Mobile Application
list.desc: A mobile app that allows you to submit a request for a commercial register in order to have the necessary permissions to establish a business.

list.title: Assurini - Administrator management website
list.desc: A website for managing insurance companies and offers, and for viewing application data statistics.
